verses.verse: And <WH935>, behold, there came a man <WH376> of God <WH430> out of Judah <WH3063> by the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> unto Beth <WH1008>–el: and Jeroboam <WH3379> stood <WH5975> by the altar <WH4196> to burn incense <WH6999>.

And he cried <WH7121> against the altar <WH4196> in the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, and said <WH559>, O altar <WH4196>, altar <WH4196>, thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; Behold <WH1121>, a child shall be born <WH3205> unto the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>, Josiah <WH2977> by name <WH8034>; and upon you shall he offer <WH2076> the priests <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116> that burn incense <WH6999> upon you <WH120>, and men's bones <WH6106> shall be burnt upon you <WH8313>.

And he gave <WH5414> a sign <WH4159> the same day <WH3117>, saying <WH559>, This is the sign <WH4159> which the Lord <WH3068> has spoken <WH1696>; Behold <WH4196>, the altar shall be split <WH7167>, and the ashes <WH1880> that are upon it shall be poured out <WH8210>.

And it came to pass <WH4428>, when king Jeroboam <WH3379> heard <WH8085> the saying <WH1697> of the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, which had cried <WH7121> against the altar <WH4196> in Beth <WH1008>–el, that he put forth <WH7971> his hand <WH3027> from the altar <WH4196>, saying <WH559>, Lay hold <WH8610> on him <WH3027>. And his hand, which he put forth <WH7971> against him <WH3001>, dried up, so that he could <WH3201> not pull it in again to him <WH7725>.

The altar <WH4196> also was split <WH7167>, and the ashes <WH1880> poured out <WH8210> from the altar <WH4196>, according to the sign <WH4159> which the man <WH376> of God <WH430> had given <WH5414> by the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>.

And the king <WH4428> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, Entreat <WH2470> now the face <WH6440> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and pray <WH6419> for me <WH3027>, that my hand may be restored me again <WH7725>. And the man <WH376> of God <WH430> begged <WH2470> the Lord <WH3068>, and the king <WH4428>'s hand <WH3027> was restored him again <WH7725>, and became as it was before <WH7223>.
And the king <WH4428> said <WH1696> unto the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, Come <WH935> home <WH1004> with me <WH5582>, and refresh yourself <WH5414>, and I will give you a reward <WH4991>.

And the man <WH376> of God <WH430> said <WH559> unto the king <WH4428>, If you will give <WH5414> me half <WH2677> your house <WH1004>, I will not go in <WH935> with you <WH398>, neither will I eat bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> in this place <WH4725>:

For so was it commanded <WH6680> me by the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Eat <WH398> no bread <WH3899>, nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>, nor turn again <WH7725> by the same way <WH1870> that you came <WH1980>.
So he went <WH3212> another <WH312> way <WH1870>, and returned <WH7725> not by the way <WH1870> that he came <WH935> to Beth <WH1008>–el.

Now there lived <WH3427> an <WH259> old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> in Beth <WH1008>–el; and his sons <WH1121> came <WH935> and told <WH5608> him all the works <WH4639> that the man <WH376> of God <WH430> had done <WH6213> that day <WH3117> in Beth <WH1008>–el: the words <WH1697> which he had spoken <WH1696> unto the king <WH4428>, them they told <WH5608> also to their father <WH1>.

And their father <WH1> said <WH1696> unto them <WH1870>, What way went <WH1980> he <WH1121>? For his sons had seen <WH7200> what <WH335> way <WH1870> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> went <WH1980>, which came <WH935> from Judah <WH3063>.
And he said <WH559> unto his sons <WH1121>, Saddle <WH2280> me the donkey <WH2543>. So they saddled <WH2280> him the donkey <WH2543>: and he rode on it <WH7392>,

And went <WH3212> after <WH310> the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, and found <WH4672> him sitting <WH3427> under an oak <WH424>: and he said <WH559> unto him <WH376>, Are you the man of God <WH430> that came <WH935> from Judah <WH3063>? And he said <WH559>, I am.
Then he said <WH559> unto him <WH3212>, Come home <WH1004> with me <WH398>, and eat bread <WH3899>.

And he said <WH559>, I may <WH3201> not return <WH7725> with you <WH935>, nor go in with you <WH398>: neither will I eat bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> with you in this place <WH4725>:

For it was said <WH1697> to me by the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, You shall eat <WH398> no bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> there <WH7725>, nor turn again to go <WH3212> by the way <WH1870> that you came <WH1980>.

He said <WH559> unto him <WH5030>, I am a prophet also as you are <WH4397>; and an angel spoke <WH1696> unto me by the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Bring him back <WH7725> with you into your house <WH1004>, that he may eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> and drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>. But he lied unto him <WH3584>.
So he went back <WH7725> with him <WH398>, and did eat bread <WH3899> in his house <WH1004>, and drank <WH8354> water <WH4325>.
And it came to pass <WH3427>, as they sat at the table <WH7979>, that the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto the prophet <WH5030> that brought him back <WH7725>:

And he cried <WH7121> unto the man <WH376> of God <WH430> that came <WH935> from Judah <WH3063>, saying <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, Forasmuch as <WH3282> you have disobeyed <WH4784> the mouth <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068>, and have not kept <WH8104> the commandment <WH4687> which the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> commanded you <WH6680>,

But came back <WH7725>, and have eaten <WH398> bread <WH3899> and drunk <WH8354> water <WH4325> in the place <WH4725>, of the which the Lord did say <WH1696> to you <WH398>, Eat no bread <WH3899>, and drink <WH8354> no water <WH4325>; your carcass <WH5038> shall not come <WH935> unto the tomb <WH6913> of your fathers <WH1>.

And it came to pass <WH310>, after he had eaten <WH398> bread <WH3899>, and after <WH310> he had drunk <WH8354>, that he saddled <WH2280> for him the donkey <WH2543>, to know <WH5030>, for the prophet whom he had brought back <WH7725>.

And when he was gone <WH3212>, a lion <WH738> met <WH4672> him by the way <WH1870>, and killed <WH4191> him <WH5038>: and his carcass was cast <WH7993> in the way <WH1870>, and the donkey <WH2543> stood <WH5975> by <WH681> it <WH738>, the lion also stood <WH5975> by the carcass <WH5038>.

And <WH582>, behold, men passed by <WH5674>, and saw <WH7200> the carcass <WH5038> cast <WH7993> in the way <WH1870>, and the lion <WH738> standing <WH5975> by <WH681> the carcass <WH5038>: and they came <WH935> and told <WH1696> it in the city <WH5892> where the old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> lived <WH3427>.

And when the prophet <WH5030> that brought him back <WH7725> from the way <WH1870> heard <WH8085> there <WH559>, he said, It is the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, who was disobedient <WH4784> unto the word <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068>: therefore the Lord <WH3068> has delivered <WH5414> him unto the lion <WH738>, which has torn <WH7665> him <WH4191>, and slain him <WH1697>, according to the word of the Lord <WH3068>, which he spoke unto him <WH1696>.
And he spoke <WH1696> to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, Saddle <WH2280> me the donkey <WH2543>. And they saddled him <WH2280>.

And he went <WH3212> and found <WH4672> his carcass <WH5038> cast <WH7993> in the way <WH1870>, and the donkey <WH2543> and the lion <WH738> standing <WH5975> by <WH681> the carcass <WH5038>: the lion <WH738> had not eaten <WH398> the carcass <WH5038>, nor torn <WH7665> the donkey <WH2543>.

And the prophet <WH5030> took up <WH5375> the carcass <WH5038> of the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, and laid <WH3240> it upon the donkey <WH2543>, and brought it back <WH7725>: and the old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> came <WH935> to the city <WH5892>, to mourn <WH5594> and to bury him <WH6912>.
And he laid <WH3240> his carcass <WH5038> in his own grave <WH6913>; and they mourned <WH5594> over him <WH1945>, saying, Alas, my brother <WH251>!

And it came to pass <WH310>, after he had buried <WH6912> him <WH559>, that he spoke to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, When I am dead <WH4191>, then bury <WH6912> me in the tomb <WH6913> where the man <WH376> of God <WH430> is buried <WH6912>; lay <WH3240> my bones <WH6106> beside <WH681> his bones <WH6106>:

For the saying <WH1697> which he cried <WH7121> by the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> against the altar <WH4196> in Beth <WH1008>–el, and against all the houses <WH1004> of the high places <WH1116> which are in the cities <WH5892> of Samaria <WH8111>, shall surely come to pass.

After <WH310> this thing <WH1697> Jeroboam <WH3379> returned <WH7725> not from his evil <WH7451> way <WH1870>, but made <WH6213> again <WH7725> of the lowest <WH7098> of the people <WH5971> priests <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116>: whoever would <WH2655>, he consecrated <WH4390> him <WH3548>, and he became one of the priests of the high places <WH1116>.
And this thing <WH1697> became sin <WH2403> unto the house <WH1004> of Jeroboam <WH3379>, even to cut it off <WH3582>, and to destroy <WH8045> it from off the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
